entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023
